title: The sum of upper triangular matrix
description: Write a program to compute the sum of the upper triangular matrix for a given matrix (the elements of the matrix are integers), and output the results.
input:
The first line is the number of test cases.

Each test case begins with a number n, indicating that the matrix is n-by-n.

The elements of the matrix is then input as n lines, each line contains n elemetns.
output: For each test case, output the sum of the upper triangular matrix in one line.
